label: Airtable
description: Add records to an Airtable table.

params.name: airtable_api_key
params.label: Airtable API Key
params.description: API key for Airtable from https://airtable.com/account.

label: Amazon SageMaker Infer
description: Perform an inference using Amazon SageMaker.

params.name: roleArn
params.label: Role ARN
params.description: Role ARN for accessing SageMaker and S3

params.name: user_email
params.label: Looker User Email
params.description: n        Click the button on the right and select 'Email'.n        This is required for the action to send status emailsn        when training or inference jobs are complete.n

label: Amazon SageMaker Train: Linear Learner
description: Start a traingin job on Amazon SageMaker, using the Linear Learner algorithm.

params.name: roleArn
params.label: Role ARN
params.description: Role ARN for accessing SageMaker and S3

params.name: user_email
params.label: Looker User Email
params.description: n        Click the button on the right and select 'Email'.n        This is required for the action to send status emailsn        when training or inference jobs are complete.n

label: Amazon SageMaker Train: Xgboost
description: Start a traingin job on Amazon SageMaker, using the Xgboost algorithm.

params.name: roleArn
params.label: Role ARN
params.description: Role ARN for accessing SageMaker and S3

params.name: user_email
params.label: Looker User Email
params.description: n        Click the button on the right and select 'Email'.n        This is required for the action to send status emailsn        when training or inference jobs are complete.n

label: Auger - AutoML Training
description: Send data to Auger to start training.

params.name: max_n_trials
params.label: Max number of trials
params.description: The maximum number of trials to run on your data training

params.name: max_total_time_mins
params.label: Max training time minutes
params.description: Maximum time alloted to train your data in minutes

label: AWS EC2 - Stop Instance
description: Stop an EC2 instance.

params.name: region
params.label: Region
params.description: EC2 Region e.g. us-east-1, us-west-1, ap-south-1 from http://docs.aws.amazon.com/general/latest/gr/rande.html#s3_region.

label: Azure Storage
description: Write data files to an Azure container.

label: Braze
description: Flags users from Looker to Braze via the REST API for use with segmentation. Ensure there's a 'braze_id' field tagged in the results. MAX EXPORT: 100000.

params.name: braze_api_key
params.label: Braze API Key
params.description: Braze API Key from https://dashboard.braze.com/app_settings/developer_console/ with users.track permission.

params.name: braze_api_endpoint
params.label: Braze REST API Endpoint
params.description: Braze REST API endpoint based on the instance location. See: https://www.braze.com/docs/developer_guide/rest_api/basics/#endpoints

label: DataRobot - Create New Project
description: Send data to DataRobot and create a new project.

params.name: datarobot_api_token
params.label: Authentication User Attribute
params.description: Select the customer user attribute that holds the DataRobot API Token.

params.name: datarobot_url
params.label: DataRobot URL
params.description: Enter your DataRobot application URL. Example: https://app.datarobot.com.

label: DigitalOcean - Stop Droplet
description: Stop a DigitalOcean droplet.

label: DigitalOcean Spaces
description: Write data files to DigitalOcean's Spaces storage.

params.name: access_key_id
params.label: Spaces Access Key
params.description: Your access key for DigitalOcean Spaces https://cloud.digitalocean.com/settings/api/tokens.

params.name: secret_access_key
params.label: Spaces Secret Key
params.description: Your secret key for DigitalOcean Spaces https://cloud.digitalocean.com/settings/api/tokens.

label: Dropbox
description: Send data directly to a Dropbox folder.

label: Facebook Custom Audiences
description: Upload data to Facebook Ads Custom Audiences from Customer List

label: Firebase
description: Use firebase to send push notifications to mobile.

label: Google Ads Customer Match
description: Upload data to Google Ads Customer Match.

label: Google Analytics Data Import
description: Upload data to a custom Data Set in Google Analytics.

label: Google Cloud Storage
description: Write data files to a Google Cloud Storage bucket.

params.name: client_email
params.label: Client Email
params.description: Your client email for GCS from https://console.cloud.google.com/apis/credentials

params.name: private_key
params.label: Private Key
params.description: Your private key for GCS from https://console.cloud.google.com/apis/credentials

params.name: project_id
params.label: Project Id
params.description: The Project Id for your GCS project from https://console.cloud.google.com/apis/credentials

label: Google Drive
description: Create a new file in Google Drive.

label: Google Sheets
description: Create a new Google Sheet.

label: Hubspot Companies
description: Update properties on your Hubspot companies.

params.name: hubspot_batch_update_size
params.label: Batch Update Size
params.description: The number of objects to batch update per call (defaulted to 10)

label: Hubspot Contacts
description: Update properties on your Hubspot contacts.

params.name: hubspot_batch_update_size
params.label: Batch Update Size
params.description: The number of objects to batch update per call (defaulted to 10)

label: JIRA
description: Create a JIRA issue referencing data.

params.name: address
params.label: Address
params.description: The address of your JIRA server ex. https://myjira.atlassian.net.

params.name: username
params.label: Username
params.description: The JIRA username assigned to create issues for Looker.

params.name: password
params.label: Password
params.description: The password for the JIRA user assigned to Looker.

label: Kloudio
description: Add data to Google sheets.

label: Marketo
description: Update Marketo leads and their campaign/list membership.

label: mParticle
description: Send user or event data from Looker to mParticle.

label: Salesforce Campaigns
description: Add contacts or leads to Salesforce campaign.

label: Segment Identify
description: Add traits via identify to your Segment users.

label: Segment Group
description: Add traits and / or users to your Segment groups.

label: Segment Track
description: Add traits via track to your Segment users.

label: SendGrid
description: Send data files to an email via SendGrid.

label: Slack Attachment (API Token)
description: Write a data file to Slack using a bot user token or legacy API token.

params.name: slack_api_token
params.label: Slack API Token
params.description: A Slack API token that includes the permissions "channels:read", "users:read", "groups:read", and "files:write:user". Follow the instructions to get a token at https://github.com/looker/actions/blob/master/src/actions/slack/legacy_slack/README.md

label: Slack
description: Explore and share Looker content in Slack.

params.name: install
params.label: Connect to Slack
params.description: View dashboards and looks,n     browse your favorites or folders, and interact with Looker content without leaving Slack.

label: Teams - Incoming Webhook
description: Send data to Teams Incoming webhook

label: Tray
description: Send data and begin a Tray workflow.

label: Twilio - Send Data
description: Send data from a Look to a phone number via Twilio.

label: Twilio - Send Message
description: Send a message to phone numbers via Twilio.

label: Zapier
description: Send data and begin a Zapier zap.
